title: Mary Reilly (1996) Julia Roberts+John Malkovich (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117002/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117002/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish.

Julia Roberts in an unusual role as a simple housemaid in the mansion of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde (John Malkovich).

Look out for Glenn Close as a whorehouse madam, and Michael Sheen (Tony Blair in 'The Queen', and David Frost in 'Frost/Nixon') as a nerd-like servant.

Thanks to Bero2000, who uploaded the DVD with all subs and audio tracks.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
